timeline.message: Move common code to a shared super class
Move static metohds in BaseTracer to BaseTracerHelper
Rename decortor to tracer in PlayTracer
Refactor startSpan(spanName) with a 2nd parameter Kind
Remove final from the input parameters

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of adding more hierarchy, I think will be better to make a static util method to convert URI to String in the format that http.url semantic convention expects and call that static util method directly from the sub classes
Maybe in class named HttpUrlUtils to match suggestion below for NetPeerUtils.
timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: sorry it looks like I was wrong about this, I thought these attributes would get set by HttpClientTracer, but I can see from test changes that they do not. i suggest reverting this change (and remove the unnecessary scope here, because i think that will make it more clear that this is not a normal instrumentation)
timeline.author: trask
